yoruba: Ó yẹ ẹni gbogbo kó dínwó aró, kò yẹ atọ̀ọ́lé.
gold: It is fitting for everybody to bargain to reduce the cost of dyeing clothes, but not the bed wetter.
gen:
Yoruba: Ó yẹ ẹni gbogbo kó dínwó aró, kò yẹ atọ̀ọ́lé.
English: It is proper for everyone to reduce the blue dye expenses, but not proper for the head of the house.
